Airbomber: I'm in the Maximal base, Infectra. Where are you?...
  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent=
: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:08 AM
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


  Ar=
mada


  Armada: Baby? That doesn't sound like you..But, anyway, where are =
you?

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:01 AM
    Subjec=
t: Re: Big Post(with fries)


    Airbomber: I'm here with Time Warp, come =
on baby, you know it's me! I'm black and white, I change into a cheetah, we=
ll I used to, but I like my robot mode, and I got inhaled by that guy, reme=
mber?...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: *Orchid* 
      To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:50 AM
      =
Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


      Armada



      Armada: Airbomber=
? How can I be sure that's you?


      (Armada awaits an answer.)
        =
----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulstice Omega 
        To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:32 AM
        =
Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


        Arrow puts Airbomber on.

     =
   Airbomber: Infectra? Is that you really?...
          ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
          From: *Orchid* 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

          Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:24 AM
          Subject: Re: Big =
Post(with fries)


          Armada



          Armada: Airbomber? You mea=
n he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on...I guess...


          (Armada says bac=
k in the commlink to Arrow confused.)

            ----- Original Message -=
---- 
            From: Soulstice Omega 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
            Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:17 AM
            Subject:=
 Re: Big Post(with fries)


            Arrow: Hera that, Airbomber? She US=
ED to be Infectra!

            Airbomber: You can't fool me, you just got =
someone who sounds just like her to pose as her...LET ME TALK TO HER!

    =
        Arrow: Airbomber wants to talk to you, Infectra. I mean, Armada...
=
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: *Orchid* 
 =
             To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Sunday, March =
18, 2001 3:10 AM
              Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


        =
      Armada



              (Armada listens to the voice coming over her =
commlink.)


              Armada: Actually, no. But that was my original n=
ame. I'm Armada now. Who is this?


              (Armada says into the com=
mlink and awaits an answer from Arrow.)

                ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
                From: Soulstice Omega 
                To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 10:19 PM=

                Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                Airbom=
ber: But where do we go?

                Arrow: That's up to you, Airbombe=
r, but I wouldn't lie to you.

                Train Wreck: Actually, he WO=
ULD lie to you, but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

                S=
tranato: I didn't see it, but I believe it.

                Airbomber: But=
 how can that be?

                Arrow: Call her.

                Airbom=
ber: I tried that.

                Arrow: You don't keep track of those ki=
nd of things? I'll call her.

                Arrow calls Armada by commlin=
k.

                Arrow: Is there anyone named Infectra there?...

      =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: Alloran2@=
aol.com 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Se=
nt: Saturday, March 17, 2001 4:56 PM
                  Subject: Big Post(wi=
th fries)


                  OOC: Please add the new Destron base to the e=
vents page, Zardus.  Its in 
                  Syria. 

                  :=
::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

                  Ramjet: The one =
extremely close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
             =
     by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the Maxi=
mals 
                  and Alliance.  The other one is the Blackfortress, =
the base a large faction 
                  of Predacons.  There are three =
Predacon leaders there, and i think we might 
                  be able to =
work out an Alliance with them. 
                  ~~~~~ 
                 =
 Wheeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!=
) 
                  ~~~~~ 
                  Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we=
 should first go to the Maximals, for they will 
                  be the m=
ost likely to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
            =
      Maximals, so be ready for anything. 
                  ::he walks out=
 of his cave and starts flying to the CF:: 
                  ~~~~~ 
      =
            ::Time Warp was releived that they were friends, until he heard=
 what they 
                  said about Infectra:: 
                  Time=
 Warp: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I didnt know her very well, but she 
  =
                definately wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here A=
irbomber, these 
                  guys are fools.
